resources.string:
Playing screen description:


This screen shows the song currently playing, artist's and album name. It should also show photo of the album.

Below the info are playback buttons.

Search screen description:


This screen shows the line for entering desired search term and a search icon on the right side.

Typing into this field app gives song ideas from the playlist.

Playlist screen description:


This screen shows available playlists in the library.

Chosen playlist shows songs in the playlist. It should also show song photos.

Albums screen description:


This screen shows available albums in a playlist.

It should also show album photos.

Artists screen description:


This screen shows all artists from all playlists.

Clicking on the artist user receives a list of artist's available albums or songs.

Store screen description:


This screen shows list of albums which can be bought. Album list contains artist's and album name and album photo.

It also contains BUY button below each album name which guides the user to the page where he can enter his credit card data.
